adverbs.description: grazingly (comparative more grazingly, superlative most grazingly)

entries.meaning: So as to graze, or brush closely against.
examples: The big mongrel, in agony, snarled and made a lunge at his irritatingly dancing tormentor. His teeth dug grazingly into the terrier's withers; and, with an impatient toss, he flung the little beast to one side.
